entity.name: DataTransfer
entity.query: SELECT temptable.*,va.SNP,va.PubMed_IDs FROM (SELECT i.ID as Identity_ID, i.Source, i.Source_ID,i.Protein_ID, cl.ID as ClassificationID,i.Gene_Class,cl.Drug, cl.Drug_Class, cl.Drug_Family, cl.Mechanism_of_Action FROM CDC.Classification cl, CDC.Identity i where cl.Identity_ID =i.ID) as temptable LEFT JOIN Variants va ON va.Classification_ID=temptable.ClassificationID
